connector.description:
Consume files from Azure Storage Blob.

Two headers will be duplicated with different names for clarity at sink level, CamelAzureStorageBlobETag will be duplicated into azure.storage.blob.e.tag and CamelAzureStorageBlobBlobSize will be duplicated in azure.storage.blob.blob.size

camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-source..name: camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-source.accountName
camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-source..description: The Azure Storage Blob account name.

camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-source..name: camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-source.containerName
camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-source..description: The Azure Storage Blob container name.

camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-source..name: camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-source.accessKey
camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-source..description: The Azure Storage Blob access key.

camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-source..name: camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-source.delay
camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-source..description: The number of milliseconds before the next poll of the selected blob.

camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-source..name: camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-source.deleteAfterRead
camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-source..description: Specifies to delete blobs after consuming them

camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-source..name: camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-source.credentialType
camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-source..description: Determines the credential strategy to adopt.
